text: 14:15 Jeremaia 51:33; Joel 3:13; Akar Mogomem 14:18; 16:17Ezɨ enselɨn igharazir mam Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ikegha iza, gumazir ghuariar ghurghurim gaperaghav itim, tiarir ekiamɨn an dɨa ghaze, “Nguazimɨn dagheba bar anigha gɨfa, ezɨ dagher kaba aghoramin dughiam a datɨrɨghɨn oto. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ uan sabar ikɨzɨrɨzim inigh, daghebar aghor.”
